content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Explain one historical development illustrated by the passage. b) Describe one way in which the developments in the passage were connected to the process of urbanization in the nineteenth century. c) Explain one way in which the audience for the posting likely shaped its message.

topic.text: 6.1: Contextualizing Industrialization and its Origins and Effects

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
